explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses a method for financial default prediction using machine learning techniques.
explanations.supervised learning: The task of financial default prediction is framed as a binary classification problem, which is a supervised learning task.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on predicting whether a user will default, which is a classification problem.
explanations.neural network: The proposed method, MotifGNN, is a type of neural network.
explanations.deep learning: The method involves deep learning techniques, specifically graph neural networks.
explanations.representation learning: The paper discusses learning representations from both lower-order and higher-order structures in graphs.
explanations.hidden layer: Neural networks, including the proposed MotifGNN, typically contain hidden layers.
explanations.Graph Neural Network: The proposed method is explicitly a Graph Neural Network (GNN) variant.
explanations.attention mechanism: The motif-based gating mechanism can be seen as a form of attention mechanism to strengthen learning of higher-order structures.
